title.narrative: By 2015,the education quality standards are known and applied.

description.narrative: Although primary completion rate remained stagnant at national level, 100% of schools in 15 out of 45 provinces are implementing the QCFS standards for improved quality of education. Innovations such as the speed learning for reading and the Safe School Strategy contributed to improved performance and strengthened resilience in schools | Status:Met | As-of Date:30/03/2018
